Obeng must have suffered a heart attack while driving to Tema on the Spintex road with his car packed in the middle of the road while people simply passed - by and carried - on with their business , until a ' Good Samaritan ' taxi driver got curious , got closer and noticed a distressed person in the packed with its engine still running .

And here I would love to give a personal testimony ; I used to live in Great Britain , Milton Keynes to be precise .
And here I would love to give a personal testimony ; I used to live in Great Britain , Milton Keynes to be precise .

I got injured , simply reached for my cell - phone , dialed the emergency ambulance number , told them my location , and within a matter of a few minutes , an ambulance came to pick me up to Milton Keynes general hospital .

And when the ambulance arrived , I was n't just bundled - up into the vehicle and driven to the hospital ; i was first asked if i had any pains anywhere in my body , a full - body examination was conducted on me , a lip cut i had suffered was treated and bandaged in the ambulance while i was being conveyed to the hospital .
